parameter.name: event_types
parameter.description: The type of Direct Message event to return.

parameter.name: max_results
parameter.description: The maximum number of results to be returned per page.

parameter.name: pagination_token
parameter.description: This parameter is used to move forwards or backwards through 'pages' of results, based on the value of the next_token or previous_token in the response.

parameter.name: expansions
parameter.description: Additional fields required in the response.

parameter.name: dm_event_fields
parameter.description: Extra fields to include in the event payload.

parameter.name: media_fields
parameter.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific media fields will deliver.

parameter.name: tweet_fields
parameter.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific Tweet fields will deliver.

parameter.name: user_fields
parameter.description: This fields parameter enables you to select which specific user fields will deliver.

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: The name of the variable to which the response should be stored.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.
